Thread

Contains logic for pausing program execution for a specified amount of time.

Functions
SleepInProgram
call Thread.SleepInProgram(
time
);

Causes program to delay execution for the specified number of milliseconds.  Preferred

Parameters
time

delay time in milliseconds

Sleep
call Thread.Sleep(
time
);

Causes program to delay execution for the specified number of milliseconds

Parameters
time

delay time in milliseconds

Note

Thread.SleepInProgram is generally preferred, as the implementation is more tolerant of movement and program logic.
